headline.main: R.A.F. 4-TON BOMS BATTER HAMBURG; Fliers Reach Target Through Storm, but Sky Clears to Reveal Their Objectives 5 BRITISH CRAFT MISSING Beaufighters Guarding Ship Lanes Down 2 Foes -- Harris Extols Berlin Raiders

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 31 -- Hamburg was the Royal Air Force's target last night and a force of heavy bombers bored through gales, electric storms and icing clouds to reach it.
abstract: RAF night raid on Berlin indus area illus
snippet: LONDON, Jan. 31 -- Hamburg was the Royal Air Force's target last night and a force of heavy bombers bored through gales, electric storms and icing clouds to reach it....

byline.original: By ROBERT P. POSTSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
